rules.label: diffModelTable
rules.labelComment: Diff : The table does not exist in all datasources tutu
rules.comment: table does not exist in all layers.

rules.label: diffModelColumn
rules.labelComment: Diff : Column does not exist in all datasources
rules.comment: Column does not exist in all layers.

rules.label: diffModelFk
rules.labelComment: Diff : Foreign key does not exist in all datasources
rules.comment: The foreign key(s) differ in certain layer(s).

rules.label: diffTech
rules.labelComment: Diff : The type for this column is not the same in all datasources
rules.comment: Column properties are not the same everywhere.

rules.label: PK
rules.comment: Primary Key (constraint(s) : ${pkColumn.constraint.name}, column position in PK : ${pkColumn.position})

rules.label: UK
rules.rule: column.fullName IN uniqueConstraints.columns AND NOT LABELLED 'PK'
rules.comment: Unique constraint indexed by ${uniqueConstraints.columns[column.fullName].index.owner}.${uniqueConstraints.columns[column.fullName].index.name} (position in index : #${indexes.columns[column.fullName].position})

rules.label: FK
rules.comment: Foreign Key constraint ${foreignKeys.columns[column.fullName].constraint.owner}.${foreignKeys.columns[column.fullName].constraint.name} (column position in FK : #${foreignKeys.columns[column.fullName].position})

rules.label: I
rules.rule: column.fullName IN indexes.columns AND NOT LABELLED 'PK' AND NOT LABELLED 'UK'

rules.label: FK??
rules.labelComment: Candidate foreign keys, that may have been forgotten
rules.rule: prefix:(column.shortName LIKE '.*_(.*)_FK') AND NOT LABELLED 'FK' AND 'T_${prefix.group1}' IN tables.byShortName
rules.comment: Column ${column.shortName} ending with '_FK', should it be declared as a foreign key to T_${prefix.group1} ?

rules.label: FK?
rules.labelComment: Candidate foreign keys, that may have been forgotten
rules.rule: column.fullName LIKE '.*_FK' AND NOT LABELLED 'FK' AND NOT LABELLED 'FK??'
rules.comment: Column name ${column.shortName} ending with '_FK', should it be declared as a foreign key ?

rules.label: I?
rules.labelComment: Foreign keys that are not indexed (ref tables excluded)
rules.rule: fk:(column.fullName IN foreignKeys.columns) AND NOT column.fullName IN indexes.columns AND NOT fk.constraint.fkTable like 'T_REF_.*'
rules.comment: ${column.shortName} is declared as a Foreign Key on ${fk.constraint.fkTable}, but without any index. If the target table is deleted/updated often, an index should be created for this column.
